name: Cashier per Users
query:
select posting_date AS "Date:Link/Account:150" , owner AS "User:Link/Account:150" , account  AS "Account:Link/Account:150" , sum(debit) As "Debit:Currency:120", sum(credit)  As "Credit:Currency:120"   , sum(debit) -  sum(credit)   AS "Balance:Link/Account:100", Company AS "Company:Link/Company:200" from `tabGL Entry`  
where posting_date =  CURDATE()
and Account = 'Cash - SSSH'
group by account ,owner;
